page.title: 05MULTI-FAITH RELIGION
page.content: We a survey of the religion of 4 classes in our school and we found that we had Christian,Moslem,Sikh, Jew,Buddhist,Hinduand Quaker children.Some had no particular belief.About one third never went to church,another third went sometimes and the other third went to church or temple regularly.Some of the children go to the Sikh temple just up the road.In out assemblies we sometimes have people from the churches or temples to talk to us.In school we celebrate Eid and Diwali as well as Christmas and Easter.We sing hymns about peace and living together as well as about God and Jesus.We have stories from different religions.Religion is every-body worshipping in different ways.
